Table 4: Matrix of the membership inference attack accuracy on a per learner basis for the
3D-CNN model across every federated learning environment. The rows indicate the attacking
learner and the columns the attacked learner. Colored cells indicate successful attacks and
more heated cells specify higher attack accuracies. The results are over 5 runs.
